name: Leave The Island
description:
You got shipwrecked! Build a raft and leave the island!

Leave The Island is a small game made for the Godot Wild Jam #41.

DISCLAIMER

The web version could have some bugs or glitches. If you want to play a bettere version I suggest to download the game.

Instructions

The game is divided in 2 part:

  • Build the raft
  • Reach an inhabitated island
Build the raft

Search the materials for building the raft in the chests.

There are 3 types of chests:

  • Normal chests
  • Locked chests (open them with a key)
  • Locked chests (open them with a puzzle)
Reach an inhabitated island

Dodge rocks and scraps to reach the other island.

Features
  • Randomized loot and items
  • Randomized chests position
  • Randomized scraps and rocks position
Controls
  • Use WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Use E to interact
  • Use I to open the inventory
Goal

Build a raft and reach an inhabitated island.
